amended_reason:
One of the polygons in the published map was incorrect and it has been updated (the distribution text was fine).

Besides this, this species category has been corrected to CR(PE), not CR(PEW) as it is not in captivity. Since this species is CR(PE), the EOO has been removed from the EOO tab and distribution text - it's rather meaningless for this species; also the Countries of Occurrence Presence coding has been changed to 'Possibly Extinct'.

authority: Coloma, Duellman, Almendáriz, Ron, Terán-Valdez & Guayasamin, 2010

errata_reason: The year of last observation was incorrect, it has been changed to 1989 in all relevant fields (population text, rationale text and red list status tab).

The previous version of this assessment had the area of occupancy, extent of occurrence and number of locations incorrectly filled in, they should all have been blank as the species is assessed only under criterion D not criterion B2. In addition, the range map was incorrect so that is also corrected in this errata version.

amended_reason: Map was in the incorrect location and has been fixed. Since this is a CR(PE) D species, the EOO/AOO and locations tabs have been cleared; these were rather meaningless for this assessment and actually not even correct.

authority: Coloma, Duellman, Almendáriz, Ron, Terán-Valdez & Guayasamin, 2010
Coloma, Duellman, Almendáriz, Ron, Terán-Valdez & Guayasamin, 2010

amended_reason: This species category has been corrected to CR(PE), not CR(PEW) as it is not in captivity. The range map was fine but it has also been updated changing the Presence code as Possibly Extinct instead of Extant; as has also been done in the Countries of Occurrence Presence coding.

The map was in the incorrect location and has been fixed. Since this is a CR(PE) D species, the EOO has been removed from the EOO tab, distribution text and rationale. It was rather meaningless for this assessment and actually not even correct. The Presence coding in the Counties of Occurrence Scheme  has also been changed to "Possibly Extinct".

errata_reason:
This errata version of the assessment was created to fix the following errors and to update the distribution map for this species:
  • The assessment date was corrected from 2015-04-23 to 2018-03-08.
  • The names of the assessors were corrected from "Maisels, F. & Ndeloh, D." to "Cronin, D., Maisels, F., Ndeloh, D. & Gadsby, E.L."
  • The name of the reviewer was corrected from "Schwitzer, C." to "Konstant, W."
  • Two previously missing threats were added: 5.3.1. Biological resource use -> Logging & wood harvesting -> Intentional use: (subsistence/small scale) [harvest]; and 5.3.2. Biological resource use -> Logging & wood harvesting -> Intentional use: (large scale) [harvest].

errata_reason:
When Syncope carvalhoi Nelson, 1975 was transferred to Chiasmocleis, the existing name of C. carvalhoi Cruz, Caramaschi & Izecksohn, 1997 (under which this species was assessed in 2004) became a later homonym and hence a replacement name was required and C. lacrimae was assigned (Peloso et. al. 2014).

A few typographical errors were corrected in the Justification and the Conservation Actions in place that were coded were updated to remove sites for conservation being identified.

This species previously appeared on the IUCN Red List as Oncorhynchus ishikawai. However, it is now considered to be a subspecies of Oncorhynchus masou. Additionally, the spelling of the subspecies epithet has been corrected to ishikawae. An amended assessment has been created to reflect this taxonomic change.
